name: Sex Triv
overview: Sex Triv is an adult arcade trivia game developed and published by Status Games in 1985. There are four categories of questions to choose from, "Ensexlopedia," "Sensual Knowledge," "Erotic Facts," and "Sexperts Only." The game will proceed to ask you very lewd questions, sometimes referencing something from popular culture. The better you are at answering the queries correctly, the more points you earn.
